name: D I C E R
description:
D I C E R RECOMMENDED TO PLAY ON PC Please play v1.1 (we fixed a couple of bugs but the content is the same)

D I C E R is a 2.5d puzzle platformer (made for the 83rd edition of the mini game jam: DREAD) where you play as a small child having a nightmare where he is chased by a spider and his only friend is a die that allows him to change dimensions.

Solve puzzles in whatever order you like and hurry to get to the other side of the world to wake up and escape the nightmare!

KEYS

WASD - To move around

Space Bar - To jump

Left Shift - To Run

E - To interact with boxes and ladders

F - To summon and throw your die

Q - To reset die if you get stuck

ESC - Pause

We did this with no pressure (and no crunching) over 3 days and we would appreciate if you would play it and leave a review! (sorry for the bugs).
